subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Ekene Ibekwe, a junior forward for Maryland, has withdrawn from this year's N.B.A. draft and is enrolled for summer classes, the university said yesterday. Ibekwe averaged 11.1 points a game last season and led the team with an average of 6.6 rebounds a game.
